articles.title: A deep learning model for predicting selected organic molecular spectra - Nature.com
articles.description: A deep-learning model, DetaNet, is proposed to efficiently and precisely predict molecular scalars, vectorial and tensorial properties, as well as the infrared, Raman, ultraviolet–visible and nuclear magnetic resonance spectra.
